member.name: BP_BUFFERFORMAT
member.summary: Specifies the format of the buffer. Used by and .

member.name: BP_BUFFERFORMAT.BPBF_COMPATIBLEBITMAP
member.summary: Compatible bitmap. The number of bits per pixel is based on the color format of the device associated with the HDC specified with or —typically, this is the display device.

member.name: BP_BUFFERFORMAT.BPBF_DIB
member.summary: Bottom-up device-independent bitmap. The origin of the bitmap is the lower-left corner. Uses 32 bits per pixel.

member.name: BP_BUFFERFORMAT.BPBF_TOPDOWNDIB
member.summary: Top-down device-independent bitmap. The origin of the bitmap is the upper-left corner. Uses 32 bits per pixel.

member.name: BP_BUFFERFORMAT.BPBF_TOPDOWNMONODIB
member.summary: Top-down, monochrome, device-independent bitmap. Uses 1 bit per pixel.
